p: Recent studies also indicate that fragrant substances may have an effect on the hormonal system [ 32]. Pick et al. [ 33] demonstrated that the main constituents of P4, viz. javanol and polysantol, act as estrogen receptor agonists (Î±ER). Although javanol has much less estrogenic activity than estradiol, it may have synergic effects in conjunction with other components of fragrant substances.
